title: Dr. Fauci says Pfizer's reported 90% vaccine efficacy rate is 'extraordinary'
author: Inyoung Choi
description: On Monday, Pfizer said its experimental coronavirus vaccine was found to be more than 90% effective in its final stage of clinical trials.
cleaned_text: - The pharmaceutical company Pfizer said on Monday that its vaccine was [found to be more than 90% effective](https://www.businessinsider.com/pfizer-coronavirus-vaccine-success-plans-for-emergency-approval-fda-2020-9?r=US&IR=T)in its final stage of clinical trials. - Dr. Anthony Fauci, the nation's leading infectious-disease expert, called the reported efficacy rate "extraordinary." - While Monday's announcement signaled a step forward, the vaccine must be approved and [widely distributed](https://www.businessinsider.com/biden-celebrates-pfizer-vaccine-notes-not-widely-available-for-months-2020-11)before life can begin to return to normal. [Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories](https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet). Dr. Anthony Fauci, the nation's leading infectious-disease expert, expressed enthusiasm at [Pfizer's announcement](https://www.businessinsider.com/pfizer-coronavirus-vaccine-success-plans-for-emergency-approval-fda-2020-9?r=US&IR=T) that its coronavirus vaccine [was found to be more than 90% effective](https://www.statnews.com/2020/11/09/four-reasons-for-encouragement-based-on-pfizers-covid-19-vaccine-results/) in its final stage of clinical trials. Fauci [said](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C00AnjAEm9M) at a [press briefing on Monday morning](https://apnews.com/article/pfizer-vaccine-effective-early-data-4f4ae2e3bad122d17742be22a2240ae8) that such an efficacy rate was "just extraordinary" and would "have a major impact on everything that we do with regard to COVID." "It's a really good day for biomedical research and clinical application of biomedical research," he said, adding that "this is very good news looking forward." Fauci said the result "validates the mRNA platform," which could indicate that a separate [mRNA vaccine](https://www.businessinsider.com/leading-us-coronavirus-vaccines-how-they-work-compare-2020-10) developed by Moderna could also have positive results. He added that this "validates greatly" the virus' spike protein as the immune-response target, which is important because it's also the target for "virtually every one of the other vaccines." Fauci [told STAT News](https://www.statnews.com/2020/11/09/four-reasons-for-encouragement-based-on-pfizers-covid-19-vaccine-results/) that "it's not only immediate good news, it really is optimistic about what's going to roll out in the next several months with the other vaccines." While the high efficacy rate that [Pfizer announced](https://investors.pfizer.com/investor-news/press-release-details/2020/Pfizer-and-BioNTech-Announce-Vaccine-Candidate-Against-COVID-19-Achieved-Success-in-First-Interim-Analysis-from-Phase-3-Study/default.aspx) contributed to optimism about a safe and effective vaccine, [the road to normality is still long](https://www.businessinsider.com/new-pfizer-vaccine-will-not-save-the-holidays-experts-2020-11). Pfizer said it was waiting to reach the "required safety milestone" before applying for emergency approval, expected later this month. But even if the vaccine is approved, it would take some time until it is widely available — so [people should expect to keep wearing masks](https://www.businessinsider.com/what-to-know-about-first-effective-coronavirus-vaccine-pfizer-2020-11) and practicing social distancing.
